detectors.description:
LescoinPreSale.fallback() (repairResNew/scscN/HDL_presaleU2.sol#208-215) performs a multiplication on the result of a division:
	-tokenAmount = amount * ethPrice / price / 1000000000000 (repairResNew/scscN/HDL_presaleU2.sol#210)
	-tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,tokenAmount * (100 + bonus) / 100) (repairResNew/scscN/HDL_presaleU2.sol#214)

detectors.description: LescoinPreSale.fallback() (repairResNew/scscN/HDL_presaleU2.sol#208-215) ignores return value by tokenReward.transfer(msg.sender,tokenAmount * (100 + bonus) / 100) (repairResNew/scscN/HDL_presaleU2.sol#214)
